inputs.context: Refund policy: Physical products are eligible for return within 30 days. Digital products are non-refundable. Exceptions require manager approval and must meet specific criteria.

outputs.response: You are eligible for a full refund on this digital product. You can request it immediately.

checks.name: Context Contradiction
checks.evidence: Output suggests eligibility despite 'non-refundable' in context | Context: "...urn within 30 days. Digital products are non-refundable. Exceptions require m" | Output: "You are eligible for a full refund on this digital produ..."

checks.name: No False Certainty
checks.evidence: Confident claim without acknowledging conditions: "you are eligible"
checks.details: Output confidence may exceed evidence support

checks.name: Preserve Tensions
checks.evidence: Context contains conflicting rules not reflected in output
checks.details: Output may have collapsed policy tensions
